TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit StringWriter extends System.IO.TextWriter

summary.span: 实现用于将信息写入字符串的 。

span.span: Implements a for writing information to a string.

summary.span: 信息存储在基础 中。

span.span: The information is stored in an underlying .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使你能够同步或异步写入字符串。 enables you to write to a string synchronously or asynchronously. 您可以使用 或 方法一次写入一个字符，使用 或 方法一次写入一个字符串。You can write a character at a time with the or the method, a string at a time using the or the method. 此外，还可以使用其中一个 方法，以异步方式写入字符、字符数组或后面跟行结束符的字符串。In addition, you can write a character, an array of characters or a string followed by the line terminator asynchronously with one of the methods. [!INCLUDE[note_unnecessary_dispose](~/includes/note-unnecessary-dispose.md)] 下表列出了其他典型或相关 i/o 任务的示例。The following table lists examples of other typical or related I/O tasks. |为此，请执行以下操作...To do this...|请参见本主题中的示例...See the example in this topic...| |-------------------|--------------------------------------| |创建文本文件。Create a text file.|[如何：向文件写入文本How to: Write Text to a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md)| |写入文本文件。Write to a text file.|[如何：向文件写入文本How to: Write Text to a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md)| |读取文本文件。Read from a text file.|[如何：从文件读取文本How to: Read Text from a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-text-from-a-file.md)| |向文件追加文本。Append text to a file.|[如何：打开并追加到日志文件How to: Open and Append to a Log File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-open-and-append-to-a-log-file.md)



| |获取文件的大小。Get the size of a file.|| |获取文件的属性。Get the attributes of a file.|| |设置文件的属性。Set the attributes of a file.|| |确定文件是否存在。Determine if a file exists.|| |从二进制文件中读取。Read from a binary file.|[如何：对新建的数据文件进行读取和写入How to: Read and Write to a Newly Created Data File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-and-write-to-a-newly-created-data-file.md)| |写入二进制文件。Write to a binary file.|[如何：对新建的数据文件进行读取和写入How to: Read and Write to a Newly Created Data File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-and-write-to-a-newly-created-data-file.md)| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何从一组双倍间距的句子创建连续段落，然后将段落转换回原始文本。The following code example demonstrates the creation of a continuous paragraph from a group of double-spaced sentences, and then the conversion of the paragraph back to the original text. [!code-cpp[System.IO.StringReaderWriter#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.StringReaderWriter/CPP/stringrw.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.IO.StringReaderWriter#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.StringReaderWriter/CS/stringrw.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.StringReaderWriter#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.StringReaderWriter/VB/stringrw.vb#1)]

## Remarks 将自动创建一个新的 对象，并将其与 类的新实例相关联。A new object is automatically created and associated with the new instance of the class. 由于没有为此构造函数指定格式控制，将使用 初始化新的实例。Since a format control is not specified for this constructor, the new instance will be initialized with . 下表列出了其他典型或相关 i/o 任务的示例。The following table lists examples of other typical or related I/O tasks. |为此，请执行以下操作...To do this...|请参见本主题中的示例...See the example in this topic...| |-------------------|--------------------------------------| |创建文本文件。Create a text file.|[如何：向文件写入文本How to: Write Text to a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md)| |写入文本文件。Write to a text file.|[如何：向文件写入文本How to: Write Text to a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md)| |读取文本文件。Read from a text file.|[如何：从文件读取文本How to: Read Text from a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-text-from-a-file.md)| |向文件追加文本。Append text to a file.|[如何：打开并追加到日志文件How to: Open and Append to a Log File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-open-and-append-to-a-log-file.md)



| |获取文件的大小。Get the size of a file.|| |获取文件的属性。Get the attributes of a file.|| |设置文件的属性。Set the attributes of a file.|| |确定文件是否存在。Determine if a file exists.|| |从二进制文件中读取。Read from a binary file.|[如何：对新建的数据文件进行读取和写入How to: Read and Write to a Newly Created Data File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-and-write-to-a-newly-created-data-file.md)| |写入二进制文件。Write to a binary file.|[如何：对新建的数据文件进行读取和写入How to: Read and Write to a Newly Created Data File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-and-write-to-a-newly-created-data-file.md)| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 `StringWriter` 类构造字符串。The following code example demonstrates how to construct a string using the `StringWriter` class. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Close() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 关闭当前的 和基础流。

span.span: Closes the current and the underlying stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关创建文件和将文本写入文件的示例，请参阅[如何：将文本写入文件](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md)。For an example of creating a file and writing text to a file, see [How to: Write Text to a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md). 有关从文件读取文本的示例，请参阅[如何：从文件读取文本](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-text-from-a-file.md)。For an example of reading text from a file, see [How to: Read Text from a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-text-from-a-file.md). 有关从二进制文件读取和写入二进制文件的示例，请参阅[如何：读取和写入到新创建的数据文件](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-and-write-to-a-newly-created-data-file.md)。For an example of reading from and writing to a binary file, see [How to: Read and Write to a Newly Created Data File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-and-write-to-a-newly-created-data-file.md). 此方法重写 。This method overrides . 此 `Close` 实现调用传递 `true` 值的 方法。This implementation of `Close` calls the method passing a `true` value. 除非显式调用 `Close`，否则刷新流将不会刷新其基础编码器。Flushing the stream will not flush its underlying encoder unless you explicitly call `Close`. 将 设置为 `true` 表示将数据从缓冲区刷新到流，但编码器状态不会被刷新。Setting to `true` means that data will be flushed from the buffer to the stream, but the encoder state will not be flushed. 这允许编码器保留其状态（部分字符），以使其能够正确编码下一个字符块。This allows the encoder to keep its state (partial characters) so that it can encode the next block of characters correctly. 此方案影响 UTF8 和 UTF7，其中某些字符只能在编码器接收到相邻字符后编码。This scenario affects UTF8 and UTF7 where certain characters can only be encoded after the encoder receives the adjacent character or characters. ## Examples 此代码示例是为 构造函数提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the constructor. [!code-cpp[System.IO.StringWriter3#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.StringWriter3/CPP/strwriter3.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.IO.StringWriter3#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.StringWriter3/CS/strwriter3.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.IO.StringWriter3#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.StringWriter3/VB/strwriter3.vb#2)]

Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放 使用的非托管资源，并选择性地释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写 时，请注意不要引用先前在调用 之前已释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed in an earlier call to .

The in which the output is written.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于必须写入标头的某些 XML 方案，必须包含 `StringWriter`所使用的编码，此属性是必需的。This property is necessary for some XML scenarios where a header must be written containing the encoding used by the `StringWriter`. 这允许 XML 代码使用任意 `StringWriter` 并生成正确的 XML 标头。This allows the XML code to consume an arbitrary `StringWriter` and generate the correct XML header. 下表列出了其他典型或相关 i/o 任务的示例。The following table lists examples of other typical or related I/O tasks. |为此，请执行以下操作...To do this...|请参见本主题中的示例...See the example in this topic...| |-------------------|--------------------------------------| |创建文本文件。Create a text file.|[如何：向文件写入文本How to: Write Text to a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md)| |写入文本文件。Write to a text file.|[如何：向文件写入文本How to: Write Text to a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-write-text-to-a-file.md)| |读取文本文件。Read from a text file.|[如何：从文件读取文本How to: Read Text from a File](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-read-text-from-a-file.md)| ## Examples 此代码示例是为 构造函数提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the constructor. summary.span: 异步清理当前编写器的所有缓冲区，使所有缓冲数据写入基础设备。

span.span: Asynchronously clears all buffers for the current writer and causes any buffered data to be written to the underlying device.

returns.span: 表示异步刷新操作的任务。

span.span: A task that represents the asynchronous flush operation.

summary.span: 将字符的子数组异步写入字符串，后跟行终止符。

span.span: asynchronously writes a subarray of characters to the string, followed by a line terminator.

span.span: A task that represents the asynchronous write operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 行终止符由 属性定义。The line terminator is defined by the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 方法来写入字符。The following example shows how to write characters by using the method. or is negative.
